column8: Peaceful Beach and Great Dolphin Watching Area
column11: Visited Kudawa Beach in Kalpitiya with my clients and enjoyed the peaceful and untouched atmosphere. The beach is quiet, clean, and surrounded by nature, making it ideal for travelers who want to relax away from busy tourist areas. The ocean views are beautiful, especially in the morning and evening. It’s also a nice area for dolphin and whale watching during the season. My clients enjoyed the calm environment and simple beauty of this coastal area.

I visited it in December 2024 and sadly the beach is severely damaged by erosion. Many parts of the strip of sand seem on the verge of totally disappearing and are now taken by debris and fishermen's trash.
Kudawa heach is one of the best beaches in Kalpitiya. The beach in front of Wellé Wadiya hotel is situated in a bay like environment which makes it very flat, shallow and safe for swimming.

column8: Very Close from The Blue Lagoon Resort
column11: lovely beach , my guests really enjoyed this place and this is such a  clean beach!  Kalpitiya  is ideal for honeymooners as this is quiet location and not too over crowded
We loved the sandy shores & super friendly locals. You can enjoy a good sea bath and the beach is very clean.

column8: Big empty quiet beach that good for relaxing
column11: This is a massive beach with a great view. I am not sure it is save to swim (the water is not that clean) and I supposed it is swim at your own risk as there isn't any facilities available for shower after swimming. I didn't see any food vendors around as well. Basically it is an empty beach that good to take a walk and enjoy the sound of the wind & wave. I went there a took a couple pf pictures, walked a little further the see the local catching fishes at the lagoon. It is a spot that the sea is in front of you and lagoon is behind of you. This is impressive and there are coconuts trees laying around. I enjoyed it very much. Do make sure you have your sunscreen with you as there isn't any shelter around.
Perfect setting and not crowded at all even during the weekend. I sat there reading a couple of days and it was just perfect. Surf is good and you can enjoying swimming in the sea.
Kudawa beach is wide beach in a bay like area with shallow water and calm sea. Probably the best beach in Kalpitiya.
